This is a test inquiry from your mentor, %{first_name}. When you receive a real booking inquiry, it will look like this. Successful hosts—like Superhosts—usually respond to these inquiries within 24 hours.
When you get messages from your guests, pre-approving can help secure the booking. You can practice this feature by pre-approving this test inquiry.

listing.localized_description:
This high-end Loft is 742 sq feet and has a fully equipped kitchen with new appliances.

Whether you are here for work or pleasure, you will be able to relax and enjoy your stay in a highly desirable and most convenient neighborhoods!

SAN FRANCISCO SHORT-TERM RESIDENTIAL RENTAL REGISTRATION NUMBER: STR-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

Possession of a San Francisco Short-Term Rental Registration Certificate certifies that the registration certificate holder has agreed to comply with the terms of the San Francisco Short-Term Residential Rental Ordinance (San Francisco Administrative Code 41A).  This ordinance does not require an inspection of the unit by the City for potential Building, Housing, Fire, or other Code violations.

This high-end Loft is 742 sq feet, has a twin sized sofa bed, also has a beautiful King sized Casper bed, and has a fully equipped kitchen with new appliances. 

Whether you are here for work or pleasure, you will be able to relax and enjoy your stay in a highly desirable and most convenient neighborhoods!

There is no parking in the building, but dozens of metered parking right out front that are fairly cheap ($0.50 to $1.50/hr depending on time of day) and free overnight. If you don't want to worry about meters, there is a lot across the street that is only $10 per night (vs. $40-60/night for hotels in our neighborhood).

Super convenient to downtown and all modes of transportation. Extremely high walk rating...

Everything is easily accessible: restaurants, museums, waterfront, shopping -- plus so much more this amazing city has to offer. It's just a short walk to Moscone Center, Union Square, the Embarcadero, Chinatown, North Beach, AT&T Park and all the nightlife of SoMa/Southbeach.

BART, Transbay terminal, and CalTrain are all 5-20 mins walking distance.

South Beach is also known as the second financial district. This means it is relatively quiet during evenings and weekends.

Transbay/Greyhound bus terminal = 5 min walk 
Montgomery BART = 8 min walk 
Ferry building = 15 min walk 
CalTrain = 20 min walk

Guests can take the airport BART to the Montgomery BART station. From there, they can either walk about 8-10mins, or take the 12 bus line from 2nd St & Stevenson to 2nd St & Folsom.

There's usually some free evening street parking available in the neighborhood from 6pm - 9am because it's a bit tucked away. It's also close to many Zip Car locations. It's easily freeway-accessible to the Eastbay, the Penninsula, and the Southbay.

You will have full access to the loft unit.  This includes access to the 42 inch television with local channels on the Tivo.

Super convenient to downtown and all modes of transportation. Extremely high walk rating...

Everything is easily accessible: restaurants, museums, waterfront, shopping -- plus so much more this amazing city has to offer. It's just a short walk to Moscone Center, Union Square, the Embarcadero, Chinatown, North Beach, AT&T Park and all the nightlife of SoMa/Southbeach.

BART, Transbay terminal, and CalTrain are all 5-20 mins walking distance.

South Beach is also known as the second financial district. This means it is relatively quiet during evenings and weekends.

It's only minutes walk from public transportation -- Muni, BART, and CalTrain. Parking can be difficult during the day, but there's usually some free evening street parking available in the neighborhood because it's a bit tucked away. It's easily freeway-accessible to the Eastbay, and the Southbay.

No smoking, no drugs, no pets, building quiet hours after 10pm (typical of most shared buildings in this area), no major gatherings/parties in the loft (the odd guest is okay).
listing.house_rules: Generally speaking, check out time is noon and check in time is 4pm, unless there are no guests coming before/after and there is flexibility to move it (which we are happy to do if that is the case!).

sorted_reviews.comments: Very easy to communicate with the host. The apartment was clean and as described on the ad. Even though it's in a busy area, the apartment is located on a side street with almost no traffic. The location was great for my conference at the Moscone centre. Most of the sights are about a 1/2 to 1 miles away. Very safe building.
Great space in San Fran! The loft is very nice, clean and in a great area. Building feels very safe. Michael was very accommodating and checked in during our stay, which was nice!
I had a great stay in Michael's loft. The location was very convenient to SoMa and the Financial District and the loft was full of great natural light.
This place was fantastic. Clean and exactly what I expected. Would definitely stay here again!
The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

listing_amenities.name: Kitchen
listing_amenities.tooltip: Space where guests can cook their own meals

listing_amenities.name: Essentials
listing_amenities.tooltip: Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper

listing_amenities.name: Heating
listing_amenities.tooltip: Central heating or a heater in the listing

listing_amenities.name: Washer
listing_amenities.tooltip: In the building, free or for a fee

listing_amenities.name: Dryer
listing_amenities.tooltip: In the building, free or for a fee

listing_amenities.name: Suitable for Events
listing_amenities.tooltip: The listing can accommodate a gathering of 25 or more attendees

listing_amenities.name: Wheelchair Accessible
listing_amenities.tooltip: Easy access to the building and listing for guests in wheelchairs

listing_amenities.name: Gym
listing_amenities.tooltip: Free, in the building or nearby

listing_amenities.name: 24-Hour Check-in
listing_amenities.tooltip: Lockbox, keyless entry, buzzer, or someone available at any time

listing_amenities.name: Laptop Friendly Workspace
listing_amenities.tooltip: A table or desk with space for a laptop and a chair that’s comfortable to work in

listing.name: Whole sunny Soma loft

This high-end Loft is 742 sq feet, has a twin sized sofa bed, also has a beautiful King sized Casper bed, and has a fully equipped kitchen with new appliances. 

Whether you are here for work or pleasure, you will be able to relax and enjoy your stay in a highly desirable and most convenient neighborhoods!

There is no parking in the building, but dozens of metered parking right out front that are fairly cheap ($0.50 to $1.50/hr depending on time of day) and free overnight. If you don't want to worry about meters, there is a lot across the street that is only $10 per night (vs. $40-60/night for hotels in our neighborhood).

Super convenient to downtown and all modes of transportation. Extremely high walk rating...

Everything is easily accessible: restaurants, museums, waterfront, shopping -- plus so much more this amazing city has to offer. It’s just a short walk to Moscone Center, Union Square, the Embarcadero, Chinatown, North Beach, AT&T Park and all the nightlife of SoMa/Southbeach.

BART, Transbay terminal, and CalTrain are all 5-20 mins walking distance.

South Beach is also known as the second financial district. This means it is relatively quiet during evenings and weekends.

Transbay/Greyhound bus terminal = 5 min walk 
Montgomery BART = 8 min walk 
Ferry building = 15 min walk 
CalTrain = 20 min walk

Guests can take the airport BART to the Montgomery BART station. From there, they can either walk about 8-10mins, or take the 12 bus line from 2nd St & Stevenson to 2nd St & Folsom.

There's usually some free evening street parking available in the neighborhood from 6pm - 9am because it’s a bit tucked away. It's also close to many Zip Car locations. It’s easily freeway-accessible to the Eastbay, the Penninsula, and the Southbay.
localized_sectioned_description.notes: No smoking, no drugs, no pets, building quiet hours after 10pm (typical of most shared buildings in this area), no major gatherings/parties in the loft (the odd guest is okay).

This high-end Loft is 742 sq feet and has a fully equipped kitchen with new appliances.

Whether you are here for work or pleasure, you will be able to relax and enjoy your stay in a highly desirable and most convenient neighborhoods!
localized_sectioned_description.access: You will have full access to the loft unit.  This includes access to the 42 inch television with local channels on the Tivo.

Everything is easily accessible: restaurants, museums, waterfront, shopping -- plus so much more this amazing city has to offer. It’s just a short walk to Moscone Center, Union Square, the Embarcadero, Chinatown, North Beach, AT&T Park and all the nightlife of SoMa/Southbeach.

localized_sectioned_description.house_rules: Generally speaking, check out time is noon and check in time is 4pm, unless there are no guests coming before/after and there is flexibility to move it (which we are happy to do if that is the case!).
localized_sectioned_description.transit: It’s only minutes walk from public transportation -- Muni, BART, and CalTrain. Parking can be difficult during the day, but there's usually some free evening street parking available in the neighborhood because it’s a bit tucked away. It’s easily freeway-accessible to the Eastbay, and the Southbay.
